attributes.action: Help fight rat infestations in many places to maintain hygiene.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to do it because it will keep the country free of rats running around and also around ovens and it will also be a hygienic action.
attributes.background: Help fight rat infestations in areas where rats are present especially around ovens so food can be assured to be safe and clean to eat.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do - we're not sure what action you would like the Government to take with regard to rat infestations.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
